name: Hitmonlee
flavorText:
When in a hurry,
its legs lengthen
progressively. It runs smoothly
with extra long,
loping strides.

previous.name: Marowak
previous.flavorText:
The bone it holds
is its key weapon.
It throws the bone skillfully
like a boomerang
to KO targets.

next.name: Hitmonchan
next.flavorText:
While apparently
doing nothing, it
fires punches in lightning fast
volleys that are
impossible to see.

pokemon.name: Tyrogue
pokemon.flavorText:
It is always
bursting with en­
ergy. To make it­ self stronger, it
keeps on fighting
even if it loses.

pokemon.name: Hitmontop
pokemon.flavorText:
If you become
enchanted by its
smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks,
you may get
drilled hard.
